comments.body: did you sweep to ensure all rest handlers that are setting Generation are doing so in PrepareForUpdate?

ds: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/daemonset/strategy.go#L75
rc: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/controller/strategy.go#L73
rs: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/replicaset/strategy.go#L74
ingress: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/ingress/strategy.go#L67
petset: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/petset/strategy.go#L67
deployments: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/085b17239503363f0fb4b0c960bf185b49495261/pkg/registry/deployment/strategy.go#L81

Not sure there is another resource using it anywhere else. Seems like an established pattern.

diffHunk:

	}
	objectMeta.Generation = oldMeta.Generation

	strategy.PrepareForUpdate(obj, old)

It's fixed now for some reason.
